item.title: Trump Notifies Congress That the U.S. Is at War with Drug Cartels
item.description: The more distant we are from an actual military threat, the more imperative it should be to obtain authorization from the people’s representatives.

item.title: Emma Watson Cannot Have It Both Ways in Her Feud with J. K. Rowling
item.description: The famous author, naturally, saw right through the actress’s artifice.

item.title: The Great Relearning
item.description: We are caught in a cycle of forgetting, then rediscovering, society’s most obvious lessons.

item.title: States Should Beware Legal ‘Double-Dipping’
item.description: Amid an ethics epidemic, states should kick the tires on outside counsel contracts.

item.title: Argentina’s Need for ‘Politics Without Romance’
item.description: Argentina requires profound structural changes that go beyond Milei himself.
